website_summaries.verdict: The Dell Inspiron 17 5000 is a nice-looking desktop-replacement laptop that offers good productivity performance and decent battery life for a very affordable price.

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my 100 year old Mother
customer_reviews.text: She loves it! Big screen and easy to use. She got it set up all by herself, including the printer interface. ***Update*** Flawless performance over the two years she's owned it. All is working well on this computer and my now 102 year old Mother.
customer_reviews.author: EngineerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a hunk of junk. It crashes at least twice a day. WiFi just plain sucks. Contacted Tech Support twice and no help. 30 days isn't a long enough time to find out well it really works. This is my 3rd laptop in less than 2 years! Thank You, Windows 10! ! Going back to Windows 7. Maybe Windows 12 will be better. It's going back to Dell. I Hope they keep it. Amazon won't deal with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and is getting a lot of good use out of it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my granddaughter who is in her second year of college. She loves it and is getting a lot of good use out of it. I don't think you can beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Crappy experience
customer_reviews.text: Power adapter wouldn't charge laptop. Had to order another adapter on my own dime. The built in speaker crackles. Didn't send it back because I didn't want to be without my laptop. Crappy experience. Graphics wise it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: MovieWatcher

customer_reviews.title: just not good enough for the internet now
customer_reviews.text: The laptop replaces a 9 year old Dell that still works, just not good enough for the internet now. Hope the new one last as long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop......too bad I bought it for work to use outside the office. I run a cloud based case management system and this laptop will not pick up a wifi signal unless I am sitting within 20-30 feet of a wifi router. Absolutely atrocious wifi pickup, to the point I can't use it at all. Dell replaced the wifi card, same problem. I want to get a refund, but I doubt dell will do that. AVOID. AVOID Dell as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had it for a few weeks and haven't found a comfortable way to use it
customer_reviews.text: The mouse pad is very difficult to get used to. I have had it for a few weeks and haven't found a comfortable way to use it. Otherwise a nice machine
customer_reviews.author: Krista Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Its good, large screen like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Its good, large screen like I wanted, quite heavy--SCREEN IS DAMAGED,NEEDS TO BE RETURNED..IM SURE IT GOT DAMAGED WHILE IN SHIPPING
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst laptop I have ever owned and I've owned around ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst laptop I have ever owned and I've owned around a dozen. It often does not respond when pressing keys and has cost me more games of online chess then I can remember. Even at a cheap price it isn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: howitzer8

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Preloaded with WIN 10, Win 10 sucks compared to Win 7. Win 10 tends to be dominate everything! Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: potgrower

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron i5758-428BLK 17.3 Inch Laptop (Intel Core i3, 4 GB RAM, 500 GB HDD, Black)
product_meta.description:
Big enough for your ideas with more features for more impact. Get undeniable performance with this 17.3" power player. Zoom, point and scroll through content quickly with a large precision touchpad.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 4 GB DDR3L SDRAM Included; 16 GB Maximum
500 GB HDD Storage; Tray load DVD Drive (Reads and Writes to DVD/CD)
